    <h2 style = "text-align: center; color: #003F72; font-family: calibri;">Session 3/4: Reviewing Case and Data Selection for Care Coordination - Learning Objectives</h2>
    <h3 style = "color: #0083BE"><b>Team Learning Goal: </b>RESPECT (Really Effectively Streamlining Patients' Evidence-based Clinical Treatments)</h3>
    <p style = "color: #0083BE"><b>Modeling to Learn (MTL) objectives include activities and competencies that...</b></p>
    <ul style = "list-style-type:disc; color: #0083BE">
      <li>Are meaning for you and align your learning goals with your team.</li>
      <li>Develop systems thinking skills to help you see how several things fit together, and understand causes hard to see w/o data and modeling resources.</li>
      <li>Make VA data, initiatives, and standards transparent to you.</li>
      <li>Empower you to realize ongoing improvements in team quality of care and team quality of work life.</li>
    </ul>
  </td>
</tr>
